name: JavascriptEvents
shortDescription: Adds conditions, actions and expressions to compare the return value of or run a javascript code.
description: Adds conditions, actions and expressions to compare the return value of or run a javascript code.
- Use the condition "Javascript code number" to compare the evaluated number out of a javascript code.
- Use the condition "Javascript code string" to compare the evaluated string out of a javascript code.
- Use the condition "Javascript code boolean" to compare the evaluated boolean value out of a javascript code.
- Use the action "Run javascript code" to run a javascript code.
- Use the expression  `Number` to return a number out of a javascript code.
- Use the expression `String` to return a string out of a javascript code.
How to evaluate the return value (of conditions and expressions):
By default, the return value is 0 or false.
Tip: use single quotes if you need to type a string:

eventsFunctions.description: the evaluated number out of a javascript code.
eventsFunctions.name: Number
eventsFunctions.sentence: the evaluated number out of the javascript code _PARAM1_

eventsFunctions.description: the evaluated string out of a javascript code.
eventsFunctions.name: String
eventsFunctions.sentence: the evaluated string out of the javascript code _PARAM1_

eventsFunctions.description: the evaluated boolean value out of a javascript code.
eventsFunctions.name: Boolean
eventsFunctions.sentence: the evaluated boolean value out of the javascript code _PARAM2_ is _PARAM1_

eventsFunctions.description: Run a javascript code using an action.
eventsFunctions.name: Action
